title: The Last Crusade: The Epic Voyages of Vasco da Gama
description:
The Last Crusade: The Epic Voyages of Vasco da Gama - Nigel Cliff [epub]

Historian Nigel Cliff delivers a sweeping, radical reinterpretation of Vasco da Gamaâ€™s pioneering voyages, revealing their significance as a decisive turning point in the struggle between Christianity and Islam â€” a series of events which foreveraltered the relationship between East and West.

This first-ever complete account of da Gamaâ€™s voyages includes new information from the recently discovered diaries of his sailors and an extraordinary series of letters between da Gama and the Zamorin, a king of modern-day Kerala, India. Cliff, the author of The Shakespeare Riots, draws upon his own travels in da Gamaâ€™s footsteps to add detail, authenticity, and a contemporary perspective to this riveting, one-of-a-kind historical epic
